abstract.t:
Taking the opportunity of a fresh implementation of SCHC by a newcomer to SCHC to reflect on the design principles and the implications on the implication of SCHC.
Topics addressed:
* The parser, as described in SCHC specification.
* A discussion on parsing and interpretation.
* Practical implications of the specification of the parser of SCHC.
* the challenge and opportunity of a generic parser implementation able to handle any protocol stack and rules design to enable it.
